FALLOUT 1 REBIRTH
=====================================

iOS/iPad Installation Instructions
----------------------------------

1. INSTALL THE APP

   Option A - AltStore (Free, 7-day refresh):
   - Install AltStore from https://altstore.io
   - Transfer fallout1-rebirth.ipa to your device
   - Open with AltStore
   - Trust the app in Settings > General > VPN & Device Management

   Option B - Sideloadly (Free, 7-day refresh):
   - Download from https://sideloadly.io
   - Connect device, drag IPA into Sideloadly
   - Enter Apple ID, install
   - Trust the app in Settings > General > VPN & Device Management

   Option C - Developer Account ($99/year):
   - Open Xcode, build to device directly
   - Or use TestFlight for distribution

2. INSTALL GAME FILES

   You need the original Fallout 1 data files from your own copy:
   - master.dat
   - critter.dat
   - data/ folder

   Transfer to iOS device:
   - Connect device to Mac via USB
   - Open Finder, select your device
   - Go to Files tab
   - Find "Fallout" app
   - Drag in: master.dat, critter.dat, data folder

   Also transfer the included config files:
   - fallout.cfg
   - f1_res.ini

3. TOUCH CONTROLS

   Single tap: Left-click (move/interact/select)
   Two-finger tap: Right-click (change cursor mode)
   Drag: Move cursor

4. IPAD KEYBOARD/TRACKPAD

   Connect Magic Keyboard or Bluetooth mouse:
   - Cursor appears automatically
   - Trackpad/mouse for cursor control
   - Keyboard for shortcuts

   Function Keys (F1-F7):
   - F3: Character screen
   - F4: PipBoy
   - F5: Inventory
   - ESC: Menu

5. CONFIGURATION

   Edit f1_res.ini to change resolution:
   - Use Files app on iOS to edit
   - Or edit on Mac and re-transfer

   Recommended for iPad:
   - SCR_WIDTH=1024
   - SCR_HEIGHT=768
   - SCALE_2X=1

6. INCLUDED ENHANCEMENTS

   - iPad mouse/trackpad support (evaera)
   - F-key emulation (evaera)
   - Status bar hiding (evaera)
   - Touch control optimization (zverinapavel)
   - 2X zoom support (zverinapavel)
   - TeamX Patch 1.3.5
   - NPC Mod 3.5
   - Restoration Mod 1.0b1
   - Dialog and Animation fixes

7. TROUBLESHOOTING

   App won't open:
   - Go to Settings > General > VPN & Device Management
   - Trust your developer certificate

   Missing data error:
   - Check all game files are in app's Documents
   - File names should be lowercase

   Poor performance:
   - Try lower resolution in f1_res.ini
   - Disable SCALE_2X
